TopicTitle: Top Game (A Top Gear Parody) - Mountain Rescue Challenge !

Articles.Content:
Here is Episode 8 of Top Gear in Game (That hasn't been suspended!) This is the Top Gear parody in game! Tonight, we attempt to rescue a Hamster from unemployment on a mountain, review some Dodge thing and even have a Little 'Fracas News!' All in this parody of Top Gear!

Thanks for reading, be sure to let me know what you think in this thread
